```{r include=FALSE}
library(tm)
library(wordcloud) 
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(topicmodels)
library(reshape2)

load('/Users/markdavenport/Documents/adexchanger-emails/dtm.RData')


```


### mergers and acquisitions

```{r, echo=FALSE}
#interesting trends:


termToExplore1 <- 'acquir'
termToExplore2 <- 'acquisit'
termToExplore3 <- 'merger'

  all_terms <- rowSums(as.matrix(dtm))
  term_to_compare1 <- as.matrix(dtm[,which(colnames(dtm)==termToExplore1)])
  term_to_compare2 <- as.matrix(dtm[,which(colnames(dtm)==termToExplore2)])
  term_to_compare3 <- as.matrix(dtm[,which(colnames(dtm)==termToExplore3)])
  
  dts <- data.frame(as.Date(paste(substr(rownames(dtm),1,4),substr(rownames(dtm),5,6),'01',sep='/')))
  
  df <- data.frame(dts)
  df[,'percentMentions1'] <- as.numeric(term_to_compare1/all_terms)
  df[,'percentMentions2'] <- as.numeric(term_to_compare2/all_terms)
  df[,'percentMentions3'] <- as.numeric(term_to_compare3/all_terms)
  
  colnames(df) <- c('dt','percentMentions1','percentMentions2','percentMentions3')
  df_plot <- melt(df, id="dt")
  
  ggplot(data=df_plot,
       aes(x=dt, y=value, color=factor(variable,labels=c(termToExplore1,termToExplore2,termToExplore3)))) +
    geom_point(shape=1) +    # Use hollow circles
    ggtitle(paste("Terms to compare:",termToExplore1,'vs',termToExplore2,'vs',termToExplore3,sep=" ")) +
    xlab("Date of Newsletter") +
    ylab("Proportion of words dedicated to term") + 
    geom_smooth() + labs(color = "Terms to Compare")



```

```{r echo=FALSE}
  term_to_compare1 <- as.matrix(dtm[,which(colnames(dtm)==termToExplore1)])
  term_to_compare2 <- as.matrix(dtm[,which(colnames(dtm)==termToExplore2)])
  

  dts <- data.frame(as.Date(paste(substr(rownames(dtm),1,4),substr(rownames(dtm),5,6),'01',sep='/')))
  
  df <- data.frame(dts)
  df[,'percentMentions1'] <- as.numeric(term_to_compare1/all_terms)
  df[,'percentMentions2'] <- as.numeric(term_to_compare2/all_terms)

  colnames(df) <- c('dt','percentMentions1','percentMentions2')
  df_plot <- melt(df, id="dt")
  
  ggplot(data=df_plot,
       aes(x=dt, y=value, color=factor(variable,labels=c(termToExplore1,termToExplore2)))) +
    geom_point(shape=1) +    # Use hollow circles
    ggtitle(paste("Terms to compare:",termToExplore1,'vs',termToExplore2,sep=" ")) +
    xlab("Date of Newsletter") +
    ylab("Proportion of words dedicated to term") + 
    geom_smooth() + labs(color = "Terms to Compare")


  
```


### words of 2015

```{r echo=FALSE}
ix <- rownames(as.matrix(dtm))%in%c("201501","201502","201503","201504","201505", "201506", "201507", "201508", "201509", "201510", "201511", "201512")
da2015 <- as.matrix(dtm)
da2015 <- da2015[ix,]
all_terms <- colSums(da2015)
mostUsedWords <- as.matrix(all_terms[all_terms>100])
colnames(mostUsedWords) <- 'wordCount'
mostUsedWords <- mostUsedWords[order(mostUsedWords,decreasing = TRUE),]
mostUsedWords <- as.matrix(mostUsedWords[1:10])
colnames(mostUsedWords) <- 'wordCount'
kable(mostUsedWords)
```
